keyMoments.title: Survives Foxy's Face Bombs
keyMoments.description: Luffy emerges unharmed from Foxy's Face Bombs, demonstrating his rubber body's resistance to explosive attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Luffy's Devil Fruit provides defensive advantages beyond just offensive stretching abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Did you really think that would work on me? I'm made of rubber!

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Hook Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts a new variation of his attacks called Gomu Gomu no Hook, delivering a powerful hooking punch to Foxy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's continued development of new fighting techniques during the Davy Back Fight.

keyMoments.title: Creative Escape from Spike Trap
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses a cannon to blast through a locked door while using the recoil to avoid falling onto Foxy's spike trap.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's growth in tactical thinking and ability to use his environment creatively rather than relying solely on brute force.
keyMoments.quote: Thanks for leaving this cannon in here, Foxy!

abilities.description: Luffy delivers a powerful hooking punch using his rubber arm. A variation of his basic punching attacks that adds a curved trajectory to surprise opponents.

keyMoments.title: Unveils Gorilla Puncher 13
keyMoments.description: Foxy reveals his Gorilla Puncher 13, a massive mechanical weapon with burning boxing gloves capable of defeating sea monsters.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the extent of Foxy's preparation and reliance on mechanical weapons to supplement his Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.quote: Behold my Gorilla Puncher 13! These burning fists have defeated countless sea monsters!

keyMoments.title: Mirror Racket and Noro Marble Oni Coach
keyMoments.description: Foxy uses his Mirror Racket to bounce Noro Noro Beams off mirrors throughout a special chamber, creating his ultimate technique that makes the slow beams nearly impossible to dodge.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Foxy's most sophisticated use of his Devil Fruit powers, combining them with environmental advantages.
keyMoments.quote: There's nowhere to run! My Noro Noro Beams will bounce off every mirror in this room!

keyMoments.title: Noro Noro Beam Sword
keyMoments.description: Foxy creates a sword made of Noro Noro photons that can slow down and bind specific body parts rather than an opponent's entire body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates advanced application of Foxy's Devil Fruit powers, showing he can shape his slow beams into different tactical forms.

abilities.description: Foxy's Seven Transformations technique where he rapidly changes disguises and uses misdirection with wooden replicas to confuse opponents.
A physical close-range attack that Foxy uses to strike opponents when they get too close.
Foxy uses a racket to reflect his Noro Noro Beams off mirrors, allowing them to bounce around enclosed spaces.
Foxy's ultimate technique combining his Mirror Racket with a mirrored chamber to create slow beams bouncing from all directions. Works in conjunction with the Gorilla Puncher 13.
Enhanced version of the Gorilla Puncher's attacks with even more powerful burning punches launched at high speed.
A whip-like sword made of Noro Noro photons that can slow down and bind specific body parts, creating shackles of slow energy rather than slowing the entire body.

reveals.information: Foxy has prepared elaborate trap-filled rooms throughout his ship specifically for the Combat portion of Davy Back Fights, including trapdoors, spike traps, and mirror chambers.
Foxy is extremely sensitive to insults about his split hairstyle, becoming emotionally distraught when mocked about his appearance.
